WorkItem.Description:
When trying to optimize my ProtPaladin stuff it result generally with some enchant staying empty (nothing select and some time the same with piece of armor).
Very strange because these work good with the old good one Tankadin module.
Â 
I attach the XML file of my toon if you want to try:)

Comments.Message: Wrong file, sorry. Here the good one.

This is a known issue, involving the difference between "relevant enchants" and "relevant items".

At the moment I set the item filters to show only "tanking items" with defense or avoidance stats (since no item, other than trinkets, would not have defense or dodge or bonus armor on it) but since we use stamina and agility enchants, there's a separate criteria for enchants.

It appears the optimizer is still out of sync with support for IsEnchantRelevant.

The easy fix would be to set Stamina and Agility and Strength as relevant stats for all items, but since 95% of all items have stamina, we'd go back to huge equipment lists with a long list of items at the bottom with little value except for its stamina.
